alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:19PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Hardee, eastern Manatee, central Charlotte, western DeSoto and Sarasota Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 419 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ona to near Arcadia to 8 miles northwest of Palmona Park. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Port, Punta Gorda, Arcadia, Wauchula, Port Charlotte, Ona, Southeast Arcadia, Myakka River State Park, Myakka City, Charlotte County Airport, Burnt Store Marina, Bowling Green, Zolfo Springs, Murdock, Nocatee, El Jobean, Limestone, Harbour Heights, Cleveland and Grove City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Hardee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
